mapper.select: select g.goodsNum, g.goodsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDesc, goodsImg, goodsDate, g.goodsImg, g.goodsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply ( goodsNum, userId, replyNum, replyCon ) values ( #{goodsNum}, #{userId}, tbl_reply_seq.nextval, #{replyCon} )
mapper.select: select r.goodsNum, r.userId, r.replyNum, r.replyCon, r.replyDate, m.userName from tbl_reply r inner join tbl_member m on r.userId = m.userId where goodsNum = #{goodsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart ( cartNum, userId, goodsNum, cartStock ) values ( tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{goodsNum}, #{cartStock} )
mapper.select: select row_number() over( order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.goodsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, g.goodsThumbimg from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.goodsNum = g.goodsNum where c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order( orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhone, amount ) values ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhone}, #{amount} )
insert into tbl_order_details( orderDetailsNum, orderId, goodsNum, cartStock ) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, goodsNum, cartStock from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhone, amount, orderDate from tbl_order where userId = #{userId}
